TopicTitle: Has anybody else had this glitch happen?

Articles.Content:
I think I've found a bug in .90, but I'm not sure. I've been doing a lot of science missions to the Mun and Minmus, but I only started using the science lab when an outpost contract called for one. After I use the lab to analyze any science data, I get this glitch - the right hand side of the window is always goofed up (in the stock game - no mods):

The buttons are still clickable, and nothing screws up in the game, but it always looks wrong. Anyone else?

See the purple text? It's longer than the devs accounted for when designing that UI element, that's all

Stretchy dialogues should be in the next update or two.
Thanks for such a fast reply - sorry I posted in the wrong place.
